text: Scoring now is independent from the scikit-learn version. Prior, this was not the case, since it depended on the `log_likelihood` function of scikit-learn in `sklearn.covariance.empirical_covariance`, which recently has undergone an update.
title: Changed scoring for group_sparse_covariance

text: Scoring now is independent from the scikit-learn version. Prior, this was not the case, since it depended on the `log_likelihood` function of scikit-learn in `sklearn.covariance.empirical_covariance`, which recently has undergone an update.
title: Changed scoring for group_sparse_covariance
Pull request merge from rphlypo/nilearn:group_sparse to nilearn/nilearn:master

text: Tests are passing. Merged by rebase. Thanks
Changed scoring for group_sparse_covariance as to render it independent from the scikit-learn version in which the log_likelihood function has been updated.
